metadata.scriptContent: pnpm run build:theme && concurrently "pnpm run build:portal" "pnpm run build:isbdm" "pnpm run build:lrm" "pnpm run build:frbr" "pnpm run build:isbd" "pnpm run build:muldicat" "pnpm run build:unimarc"
pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint --quiet && pnpm test --run && node scripts/test-site-builds.js --site all --env local --skip-build
pnpm nx:cache:clear && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm setup
pnpm install && pnpm nx:daemon:ensure && pnpm health
pnpm stop:portal && pnpm build:theme && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start

pnpm stop:all && ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start portal --port 3000" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/ISBDM --port 3001" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/LRM --port 3002" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/FRBR --port 3003" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/isbd --port 3004" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/muldicat --port 3005" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/unimarc --port 3006" "nx dev admin"

pnpm stop:all && pnpm build:theme && concurrently "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start portal --port 3000" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/ISBDM --port 3001" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/LRM --port 3002" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/FRBR --port 3003" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/isbd --port 3004" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/muldicat --port 3005" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/unimarc --port 3006" "nx dev admin"

/bin/sh -c 'pnpm stop:all && pnpm build:theme && concurrently "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start portal --port 3000" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/ISBDM --port 3001" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/LRM --port 3002" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/FRBR --port 3003" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/isbd --port 3004" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/muldicat --port 3005" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/unimarc --port 3006" "nx dev admin"'
pnpm stop:frbr && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/FRBR --port 3003
pnpm stop:isbd && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/isbd --port 3004
pnpm stop:isbdm && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/ISBDM --port 3001
pnpm stop:lrm && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/LRM --port 3002
pnpm stop:muldicat && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/muldicat --port 3005
pnpm stop:newtest && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/newtest --port 3008
pnpm stop:portal && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start portal --port 3000
pnpm stop:unimarc && DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/unimarc --port 3006
lsof -ti:3000,3001,3002,3003,3004,3005,3006,3007,3008 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pkill -f 'docusaurus start' 2>/dev/null || true
node scripts/test-site-builds.js --site portal --env production && node scripts/test-site-builds.js --site ISBDM --env production
nx run-many --target=build --all --parallel=3 && node scripts/test-site-builds.js --site all --env production && pnpm test:post-build:local
pnpm test:ci:smoke && pnpm test:ci:integration && pnpm test:ci:e2e
pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint --quiet && pnpm test && pnpm test:builds:config
pnpm test:pre-commit && pnpm test:e2e:integration:affected && pnpm test:builds:critical
nx affected --target=lint && nx affected --target=typecheck && nx affected --target=test && nx affected --target=build

node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const cfg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('.prepushrc.json')); cfg.runE2E=true; fs.writeFileSync('.prepushrc.json', JSON.stringify(cfg,null,2)); console.log('E2E enabled for this run');" && node scripts/pre-push-check.js

commands: concurrently "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start portal --port 3000" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/ISBDM --port 3001" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/LRM --port 3002" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/FRBR --port 3003" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/isbd --port 3004" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/muldicat --port 3005" "DOCS_ENV=local docusaurus start standards/unimarc --port 3006" "nx dev admin"
